BBjGridExWidget.StatusBar

Class BBjGridExWidgetStatusBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • BBjGridExWidget.StatusBar.BBjGridExWidgetStatusBar

  • public class BBjGridExWidgetStatusBar
extends java.lang.Object
    BBjGridExWidgetStatusBar BBjGridExWidget status bar manager. The class can add , remove & hide status bar components
